description.en: BUSDX is a staking and rewards token that was created on the Binance Smart Chain, with a mechanism that distributes 10% rewards in BUSD to holders automatically. By holding BUSDX, holders will obtain a genuine source of passive income paid out in BUSD (a fiat USD equivalent). BUSDX has also developed a staking Dapp and a BUSDX launchpad. The virtual BUSDXpay system is currently being developed and will be available to our investors soon.
